text: Ba siran da makandalakaw ko lopa, ka an iran maylay o antonaa i miyambtad o kiya akiran ko siran a miyaonaan iran? Miyabaloy siran a siran i lbi a di siran i bagr, go manga rarad ko lopa: Na siniksa siran o Allah sabap ko manga dosa iran, go da a miyabaloy a miyakalinding kiran ko (siksa o) Allah
